Apple stock dips after WWDC 2025 🍎📉
iOS 26 & iPadOS 26 bring new features, but broad support for older devices may have disappointed investors.

👉 Fewer hardware upgrades = possible pressure on sales & margins.

#Apple #AAPL #WWDC2025 #iOS26 #iPadOS26 #Stocks #Finance https://t.co/puYZCC9RK3

アップルの新製品発表に革新性が無いとかの失望売りがあったらしいけれども。
なんだかんだ言ってアップル製品は根強い支持があるわけで。
米国で製造されるようになる流れは結局支持されるはずだ。
https://t.co/OY1wds9WXL

Apple stock often dips during its WWDC developer conference as traders react to product announcements and "sell the news" behavior. This trend has repeated for years.
